title: Apple’s newest store in South Korea now open [Gallery]
content:
A couple of days ago, Apple shared some photos of its newest Myeongdong store in South Korea. Now, starting this Saturday, it’s receiving customers for the first time. This Apple Store is the largest in the country.

more…

The post Apple’s newest store in South Korea now open [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple shared some photos of its newest Myeongdong store in South Korea. Now, starting this Saturday, it's receiving customers.
